Our economy continues to flourish! GDP grew 3.1 % from the 4th quarter of 2017 to the 4th quarter of 2018, the fastest growth in 13 years. I want to thank @POTUS for supporting policies that promote economic growth for all Americans. #EconomicReport

I am deeply saddened to hear that a veteran died by suicide in Clarksville, TN yesterday. We must do everything we can to reduce suicides among those who served our nation. If you are a veteran and are having suicidal thoughts, please visit  https://www.veteranscrisisline.net/ .

I’m heartbroken to learn of the #NewZealandShootings which took 49 innocent lives while they were practicing their religion. I condemn this true act of hate, and my thoughts and prayers are with the families and friends of the victims at this time.

College should be where we freely exchange and debate ideas. That is why I was proud to introduce a resolution that encourages the protection of free speech on campuses. Watch the video to learn more! pic.twitter.com/JyHqgf4wK9

Yesterday, I introduced a resolution that promotes free speech on college campuses. Check out my Op-Ed in the @DailySignal to learn why I think it is more critical now than ever for people to express their First Amendment rights. https://www.dailysignal.com/2019/03/08/its-time-for-congress-to-defend-free-speech-on-campus/ …

H.R. 1 would federalize our election system, limit American citizens’ free speech and fund political campaigns with taxpayer dollars. I was very proud to vote against this bill today. Read more here  https://roe.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=398459 … pic.twitter.com/iCK2Rk9PKz

On this #InternationalWomensDay, let’s celebrate all the women who have impacted the world and our own lives. I personally want to thank all the women who have made a powerful influence in my life. Thank you!

I’m happy to hear that American reporter Cody Weddle was released and is headed back to the United States. We should aspire to promote a free press worldwide, and the Maduro regime’s attempt to intimidate journalists will only strengthen opposition to this brutal dictator.

I am deeply disturbed by the violent actions of the Maduro regime, and condemn the detention of journalist Cody Weddle. My prayers are with Cody and his family, and I join @RepMGriffith , @MarioDB and the Trump Administration in demanding his immediate safe release.
